column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: aber a ahemfo wotu sa mu no
column6: na no nkowaa ka no ho
column7: na Israel nyinara; na wɔkɛsɛɛ Ammonmba no
column8: na wokotuaa Rabaa. Na David dze otsintsimii wɔ Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ewimbir bi
column3: David soɛree fii ne mpa do
column4: na ɔpasapasaar ɔhen no ne dan no etsifi: na ofi ɔdan no etsifi na ohun ɔbaa bi a oruguar; na ɔbaa no ehwɛ no a

column2: "Na David somae ma wokebisaa ɔbaa no n'ekyir kwan. Na obi see dɛ
column3: Ana nnyɛ Eliam ne babaa Bat-seba
column4: Hitinyi Uria ne yer no nye yi bi a?"

column2: "Na David somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɛfaa no; na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔnye no hyiae; (nna mbrɛana oewie ne mfikyirkɔ mu atɔrmuadze); na ɔsanee kɔr ne fie."

column2: "Na ɔbaa no nyinsenii; na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ David
column4: Minyinsen."

column2: "Na David somae ma wɔkɔr Joab hɔ
column4: Gya Hitinyi Uria kwan ma ɔmbra me nkyɛn. Na Joab gyaa Uria kwan ma ɔkɔr David nkyɛn."

column2: "Na aber a Uria baa ne nkyɛn no
column3: David bisaa no mbrɛ Joab na ɔman no hɔn ho tse
column4: na mbrɛ ɔsa no ayɛ yie apa."

column2: "Na David see Uria dɛ
column4: na kɔhohor w'anan ho.  Na Uria fii ɔhen no ne fie kɔree
column5: na wɔdze ayɛyɛdze fi ɔhen hɔ kaa no do."
column6: "#11.8 Kɔhohor w'anan ho: Iyi botum akyerɛ ahomgye anaadɛ banyin na ɔbaa hɔn ndae."

column2: "Na Uria dze
column3: ɔnye no wura no nkowaa no nyinara kɛdaa ɔhen no ne fie abowano
column4: na oennsian annkɔ ne fie."

column2: "Na aber a wɔkaa kyerɛɛ David
column4: Uria oennsian annkɔ ne fie no
column6: Ana immfi kwan nam bi a? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ennsian annkɔ wo fie?"

column2: "Na Uria see David dɛ
column4: na Israel
column6: tsetse asese mu; na mo wura Joab
column8: wɔakyer nsera wɔ haban petee mu; na emi nna monkɔ me fie
column10: na menye me yer nda anaa? Dɛ etse ase
column11: na wo kra tse ase yi

column2: "Na David see Uria dɛ
column4: na ɔkyena mebɛma akɔ. Nna Uria tsenaa Jerusalɛm da no

column2: "Na aber a David frɛɛ no no
column3: odzidzii na ɔnomee wɔ n'enyim; na ɔmaa ɔbowee: na ewimbir no osii mu kɔree kɛdaa ne mpa do ɔnye no wura no nkowaa no
column4: na mbom oennsian annkɔ ne fie."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column4: David kyerɛɛw nwoma dze kɛmaa Joab
column5: na ɔdze nam Uria nsa do kɔree."

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛwee wɔ nwoma no mu
column4: Hom mma Uria nkedzi mbrɛ ɔko no asaasaa do no ano
column5: na hom mfi ne nkyɛn mpem adze

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Joab rohwɛ kurow no no
column3: ɔdze Uria kedzii beebi mbrɛ onyim dɛ mbarimba a wɔyɛ ndam wɔ."

column2: "Na kurow no mu mbarimba fiir edzi
column3: na wɔnye Joab bɔkoe: na nkorɔfo no mu bi totɔree
column4: mekyerɛ David no nkowaa no a; na Hitinyi Uria so tɔree."

column2: "Nna Joab somae ma wɔkɛkaa ɔsa no mu nsɛm nyinara kyerɛɛ David;"
"na ɔhyɛɛ ɔbɔfo no
column4: Sɛ iwie ɔsa no mu nsɛm nyinara ka dze kyerɛ ɔhen no
column9: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bɛɛn kurow no dɛm kɔkoe? Ana hom nnyim dɛ wobefi fasu no do atotow a?"

column2: "Woana na okum Jerubeset ne ba Abimelek? Ana nnyɛ ɔbaa bi na ofi fasu do toow ewuyambobaa bɔɔ no
column3: ma ɔtɔree wɔ Tebez no bi a? Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bɛɛn kurow no dɛm yi a? Ɔno se dɛ
column4: W'akowaa Uria

column2: "Nna ɔbɔfo no sii mu kɔree
column3: na ɔbaa bɛkaa dza Joab dze somaa no no nyinara kyerɛɛ David."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no see David dɛ
column4: na wopuei baa hɛn do wɔ haban no mu
column5: na yɛkɔr hɔn do araa dze kodur kuropon n'ahɛnee no mu."

column2: "Na atowfo no fi fasu no do totowee guu wo nkowaa do; na ɔhen no nkowaa no binom atotɔr
column4: Hitinyi no so atɔr."

column2: "Nna David see ɔbɔfo no dɛ
column4: Mma mma asɛm yi nnyɛ wo awerɛhow
column5: na afona twa obi dɛ mbrɛ otwa obi so: ma wo ko no mu nyɛ dzendzen wɔ kurow no do
column6: na dwuruw no: na ɔwoara hyɛ no dzen."

column2: "Na aber a Uria ne yer tsee dɛ no kun Uria oewu no
"Na aber a eyiyɛ no twaa mu no
column3: David somae ma wɔkɛfaa no baa ne fie
column4: na ɔbɛyɛɛ ne yer
column5: na ɔwoo babanyin maa no. Na adze a David yɛɛ no yɛɛ EWURADZE ebufuw."
